1.caption_en: Slide explains how an ecosystem perspective coordinates and aligns company-wide digital business and venture initiatives by linking a strategy layer (define and continuously adapt ecosystem strategy) with an execution layer (initiate new ventures and optimize existing ones). It highlights portfolio-alignment benefits and entrepreneurial execution steps (validate/launch/scale and optimize) to drive long-term company value.
1.caption_ru: Slide explains how an ecosystem perspective coordinates and aligns company-wide digital business and venture initiatives by linking a strategy layer (define and continuously adapt ecosystem strategy) with an execution layer (initiate new ventures and optimize existing ones). It highlights portfolio-alignment benefits and entrepreneurial execution steps (validate/launch/scale and optimize) to drive long-term company value.
